1.title: Galiza - Lisboa
1.plot: Without much enthusiasm, Daniel travels to Lisbon without his girlfriend to start filming. In the city ends up knowing Margarida, an attractive tour guide who will try to help you solve the problems that arise during the recording. Daniel is a Galician actor who has to present and direct a documentary about the Portuguese Way, because his girlfriend is the producer of the project. Without much enthusiasm, Daniel travels to Lisbon without his girlfriend to start filming. In Lisbon you meet Margarida who works as a tourist guide in the city and who will help you with ...

2.title: Lisboa - Santarém
2.plot: In Lisbon, Margarida explains to Daniel the glorious past of Portugal, but he has an attitude of irreverence and the historical differences between Portugal and Spain seem to reproduce between them. After this tension they will have to figure out how to reconcile themselves.

3.title: Santarém - Fátima
3.plot: In Santarém, Daniel receives a phone call from his girlfriend, jealous, after seeing pictures of him with the attractive tourist guide in social networks. Daniel assures him that there is nothing between them and that everything runs according to plan, although, in fact, they deviate from the itinerary to approach Fatima, where a century ago the Virgin appeared to the three shepherds.

4.title: Tomar - Coimbra
4.plot: In Tomar, Daniel confesses to Margarida that their relationship is going through difficulties. In order to try to mitigate her companion 's emotional problems, the guide tells her the romantic love story that took place in Coimbra between Dom Pedro, Prince of Portugal and Inês de Castro, Queen after her death.

5.title: Coimbra - Aveiro
5.plot: The next morning, in Coimbra, the filming of the documentary must continue. Daniel and Margarida pretend to the recording crew that there is nothing between them, but the sexual tension is obvious. The situation worsens when Daniel receives a call from his girlfriend and to dissimulate he talks to her affectionately.

6.title: Porto
6.plot: Inês appears on the documentary's surprise recording. The situation is uncomfortable, Daniel and Margarida have to act with professionalism. The producer puts everything into play, but she has no choice but to trust Daniel and Margarida. The two have to do a good job because the economic future of Inês's company depends on the documentary they are recording.

7.title: Barcelos - Valença
7.plot: Concerned about the responsibility of having at hand the project that can sink the company of his girlfriend, Daniel records the route of the Portuguese Way to the border. He is accompanied by Margarida, but marks the distance with her. However, it seems that they both want to be together.

8.title: Tui - Redondela
8.plot: Before crossing the border, Daniel asks Margarida to continue with him to Compostela. The tourist guide had only been hired to help during the recording in Portugal, but the director considers that his presence is necessary until the end. Margarida agrees to accompany him, because he believes that Daniel will leave his girlfriend for her.

9.title: Pontevedra - Padrón
9.plot: Daniel is unable to break with Inês, which requires him to dismiss Margarida and finish the recording of the documentary. To provide you with the information you need about the places in Galicia through which the Portuguese Way will be accompanied by Laura, the producer's sister, a historian who helped her to prepare her for the project.

10.title: Compostela
10.plot: The sister of the producer analyzes the material that Daniel recorded in Portugal. It will not be a conventional documentary, but it has a lot of interesting content. However, the end is missing. In Compostela, Daniel tries to find a way to complete the project. But what he seeks is far from the capital of Galicia.

locations: Santiago de Compostela, A Coruña, Galicia, Spain
imdb.title: Caminhos de irmandade
